text: Noa Lindberg (Hebrew: נועה לינדברג; born April 25) is an American Actor, Writer, Producer, Director, of Israeli and European descent.Miami Beach Life Magazine July–August 2018 issue www.miamibeachlifemag.com. Retrieved August 29, 2018.Voyage Magazine April 2019 issue www.voyagemia.com. Retrieved May 17, 2019. As an Actress, she is best known for the Automated Selfie stick video,Automated Selfie Stick Video YouTube. Retrieved May 3, 2018. produced by Thinkmodo to promote TV Series UnReal Season 2 on Lifetime. The video went viral within hours and immediately reached millions of views and shares.Golem13 Facebook www.facebook.com/golem13.fr. Retrieved May 3, 2018.Mashable Facebook www.facebook.com/mashable. As a Host, she is known for having her own interview show for iHeartRadio's Evolution 93.5. Artists she has interviewed include David Guetta, The Chainsmokers, Axwell & Ingrosso, Afrojack, Cheat Codes, Hardwell, Steve Aoki, Cash Cash, Craig David and Kygo.Steve Aoki interview by Noa LindbergHardwell interview by Noa Lindberg for EVOLUTION 93.5iHeartMedia presents the Music Lounge at Ultra Music As a Director, she's best known for having Directed Tekashi 69's music video Bebe featuring Anuel, as well as Logan Henderson, Madison Beer, and Lovelytheband, at the iHeartRadio's Y100 Miami Jingle Ball 2018.TMZ Article Tekashi69 brings the ChamPain www.tmz.com. Retrieved August 29, 2018. As a Producer, she's known for a variety of ads and photoshoots for Puma with Rickie Fowler, Cobra Golf with Greg Norman and Lexi Thompson, and Bed Bath & Beyond products. ==Early life== Noa Lindberg was born in Israel and raised in Paris, France.Miami Beach Life Magazine July–August 2018 issue "Born in Israel, grew up in France" www.miamibeachlifemag.com. Retrieved August 29, 2018. She is the daughter of Henri, an architect, and Hanna a Six-Day War veteran. Noa attended Lycee Pasteur High School and Paris IX Dauphine University & Business School where she graduated with a Master's of Business Administration & Master's of International Business Law. Lindberg speaks English, French, Hebrew, German, and Spanish. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year !! Title !!
